title: What LLS Means in Texting, on Instagram & More

steps.title: LLS stands for “Laughing like sh*t” in texts and on social media.
steps.content: LLS stands for “Laughing like sh*t” in texts and on social media. When a friend’s text or post on Facebook, Instagram, or Snapchat has you laughing uncontrollably, send them “LLS” to let them know you find them hilarious! Or, fire off “LLS” to your friends when you can’t contain your laughter about a funny meme, video, or story from your day. [1] X Research source “This is the funniest video I’ve ever seen! I’m LLS 🤣” “Guys, I’m lls 🤣 My dog is sitting on the couch and watching TV like a person 💀” “LLS at the pic you posted on Facebook 😆 You’re hilarious!”

steps.title: LLS can also mean “Laughing like so crazy” or “Laughing like silly.”
steps.content: LLS can also mean “Laughing like so crazy” or “Laughing like silly.” “Laughing like so crazy” or “Laughing like silly” are similar to “Laughing like sh*t” and just mean something your friend texted you or messaged you on social media has you in stitches. So, send “LLS” or reply with it when you find something really funny and are laughing super hard! [2] X Research source “Your meme game is strong, I’m lls 😝” “LLS, my sister just walked into a window 🤣” “I can’t believe you said that to the teacher! I’m LLS 😆”

steps.title: LOL, ROFL, and LMAO all have similar meanings to LLS.
steps.content: LOL, ROFL, and LMAO all have similar meanings to LLS. Texting or messaging “LLS” on social media is usually reserved for things you find beyond funny. This makes LLS similar to other slang terms like: LOL (laughing out loud) ROFL (rolling on the floor laughing) LMAO or LMBO (laughing my a** off, or laughing my butt off) CTFU (cracking the f*ck up) Haha, hahaha, or bwahaha

steps.title: Lots of love and support
steps.content: Lots of love and support In texts and on Facebook and Instagram, sending “LLS” can be a way to comfort someone who is going through a hard time. You might text or message “LLS” to encourage a loved one when they’re healing from an injury, dealing with bad news, or making a tough move. “I’m sending you LLS ❤️ I hope you feel better soon.” “I'm so sorry to hear about your breakup. Sending LLS your way!"

steps.title: Love, Light, and Smiles
steps.content: Love, Light, and Smiles If your friend needs a boost of positivity, text or message them “LLS.” Sending them love, light, and smiles is a nice gesture that lets them know that you’re by their side and can help them feel optimistic about whatever they’re going through. “Sending you LLS today! 😘 You’re going to ace your test!” “Spreading LLS on this gray, rainy day!"

steps.title: Long Live
steps.content: Long Live In some cases, “LLS” can show your support for someone or something, like a loved one, celebrity, place, or event, and express your hope that they live for a long time. You might also use “LLS” to express your condolences if someone recently passed. [3] X Research source “I can’t think of a more iconic artist than Shakira! 😍 LLS 💕” “I’m so sorry to hear about Sam’s passing. LLS 🕊️🙏”

steps.title: LifeLine Support
steps.content: LifeLine Support LifeLine Support is a government program that offers discounts for phone, internet, and other communication services. If you work for a communications company, a local assistance program, or the government, you might see “LLS” as an abbreviation for this service. [4] X Trustworthy Source Federal Communications Commission Independent U.S. government agency responsible for regulating radio, television, and satellite, and phone communications Go to source

steps.title: Leukemia and Lymphoma Society
steps.content: Leukemia and Lymphoma Society “LLS” can also stand for the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society, which offers educational resources and support for people diagnosed with leukemia or lymphoma. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Loyola Law School
steps.content: Loyola Law School “LLS” is a common way to shorten Loyola Law School at Loyola Marymount University in California. If you or someone you know goes to the school, you might text or message about it using “LLS.” [6] X Research source

steps.title: Language Learning Strategies
steps.content: Language Learning Strategies In teaching and education fields, “LLS” stands for “Language Learning Strategies.” These are engaging strategies used by teachers to help their students learn a new language easier and faster. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Ladies Love Schmidt
steps.content: Ladies Love Schmidt On the TV sitcom New Girl , “LLS” stands for “Ladies Love Schmidt.” In the pilot episode of the show, Schmidt describes his abs as “LLS: Ladies Love Schmidt.” This solidifies Schmidt’s character as a loveable but obnoxious womanizer. [8] X Research source
